note: rejects Woodhead's emendation of the text of Thucydides from BipoLav to Bpiav and thus casts some doubt on his location of Brea. A. J. Graham
title: 172-192) agrees with Woodhead that the date of foundation is after 446. He admits that, according to the generally accepted epigraphical criteria, it should not be put after about 438. Since he rejects those criteria, he is consistent in placing the foundation of Brea in 426/5 and attributing it to Cleon's aggressive imperialism. He is inclined to accept Woodhead's location of the site
